game.name: Maid of Sker
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 스커의 하녀는 영국의 귀신 설화를 바탕으로, 외지고 섬뜩한 역사를 지닌 호텔에서 벌어지는 1인칭 서바이벌 호러 게임입니다. 조용한 이들이 선사하는 악몽을 경험해보십시오. 그들이 도착하면, 당황하면 안 됩니다 - 심지어 숨도 쉬지 마십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Maid of Sker is a first-person survival horror, set in a remote hotel with a gory and macabre history from Welsh folklore. Brave the nightmares of the Quiet Ones. Do not panic…don’t even breathe!

reviewHighlights.text: Very mediocre walking sim horror game where the braindead AI is more annoying than scary. Nothing really stands out about this game.
Honestly... really disappointed. I had huge hopes for this one. The enemy AI is absolutely horrible and inconsistent, and the evasion mechanic (essent...
